column5: Newly renovated suite, built in 1942, tucked in the Heart of The Cultural District in Historic Amarillo. This detached studio apartment features a comfortable king bed with plush, white bedding, seating area, Insta-bed air mattress for extra guests, private bathroom with a shower, and a full kitchen. We're pet friendly :) In Midtown and close to Downtown, right off I-40. Perfect for overnight stop, business trip, or quick get-a-way!
